amendment.description: To limit application of the gag clause to self-insured group health plans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4011 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 11 - 89. Record Vote Number: 208.

action.text: Amendment SA 4011 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Lee. (consideration: CR S6179; text: CR S6179) To limit application of the gag clause to self-insured group health plans.
